scripts.start:service:choreographer: docker-compose -f ./choreographer/docker-compose.yml up && docker exec -it broker /usr/bin/kafka-topics --create --bootstrap-server localhost:9092 --replication-factor 1 --partitions 1 --topic user-data
scripts.start:service:keycloak: docker run -p 8080:8080 -e KEYCLOAK_ADMIN=admin -e KEYCLOAK_ADMIN_PASSWORD=admin quay.io/keycloak/keycloak:21.1.0 start-dev
